devdoc.author: ZeroLend
devdoc.details: This is a beacon contract that holds the latest implementation of a pool. Pools once created need to also have some deposit added into it else it will be vulnerable to a liquidity index manipulation attack.

params._implementation: The latest implementation of the pool.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

implementation.details: Must return an address that can be used as a delegate call target. {BeaconProxy} will check that this address is a contract.

devdoc.title: Pool Factory Contract

constructor.notice: Inits the factory with an implementation of the pool.

userdoc.notice: Creates new instances of a Pool
